name: Leave No Bot Behind
description: Leave No Bot Behind is a game that was the fourth and last task to be performed as part of game development study at Game Dev School 2016/2017. LNBB is a game about capturing, pulling and guiding a group of robots controlled by basic artificial intelligence. Each level consists of several challenges. The player's task is to conduct friendly robots from point A to B and protect them from traps and hostile robots. The basic mechanics are gripping and conducting friendly robots. The player has at his disposal skills such as throwing flags with different properties, impact on robots (attracting, repulsive, deafening, protecting against injury and against detection, etc.).
